question_text: Which muscle forms the linea alba?
explanation: Linea alba is formed by fusion of aponeuroses
explanation_c: Correct! Rectus abdominis inserts into linea alba

question_text: Which valve prevents backflow into the left atrium?
explanation: Mitral valve separates left atrium and ventricle
explanation_b: Wrong - tricuspid is on right side
explanation_c: Wrong - aortic guards left ventricle outflow

question_text: Which pacemaker normally initiates the heartbeat?
explanation: SA node is the natural pacemaker of the heart
